sentence: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the 30 stocks making up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Home Depot ( HD ) is the #9 analyst pick.
Home Depot also comes in above the median of analyst picks among the broader S&P 500 index components, claiming the #153 spot out of 500.
Looking at the stock price movement year to date, Home Depot ( HD ) is showing a gain of 23.9%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
